attributes.action: Petition to bring back the death penalty
attributes.additional_details: It would be interesting to see just how many of the British Public would vote for the Death penalty to be brought back and under certain contions.
attributes.background: consider re introducing the Death Penalty

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition which calls for a similar action: 

Abolish whole life orders and reintroduce the death penalty 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700357
